text: @10DowningStreet @BorisJohnson @UniofOxford BORIS you are lying to the people again the number of coronavirus cases has gone through the roof again you are not releasing figures and hospitals are starting to get overwhelmed again! Because people are going out! #TELLTHETRUTH
